item.title: Explore Robotics with WRO ROBO Mission Elementary | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Interested in Robotics?
Would you like to join a WRO (World Robot Olympiad) team or just try it?

Whether you're ready to compete or just curious to explore the world of robotics, we have options for you. No experience? No problem‚Äîcome and see what it‚Äôs all about!

Bring a friend or two, and we‚Äôll provide everything you need‚Äîmaterials to build your robot, expert coaching, and a dedicated space to practice. Don‚Äôt miss this exciting opportunity to learn, create, and compete! üöÄü§ñ

item.title: Web Design Level 1 Certification (Tweens and Teens Only) | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Class Schedule:
The class meets Monday through Friday, from 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM.

The class runs from June 9, 2025, to August 23, 2025. Join us for as many weeks as you need to prepare for the certification exam, and attend on the weeks that best fit your schedule.

Flexible Learning:
If you're already familiar with certain topics, feel free to skip ahead to the week that matches your needs.

item.title: Practice Space for WRO ROBO Mission Elementary | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Do you already have your own robot and coach? We offer practice space for rent‚Äî10 hours for just $199.

Adult supervision is provided; however, no instruction or teaching will be offered.

Before you place your order, please make sure that your availability aligns with ours by visiting our booking page to reserve your slots.

item.title: Chess Club and Classes | Blue Ridge Boost
Computer Coding Classes and Tutoring | Blue Ridge Boost
Future Innovators | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description:
Would you like to join a WRO (World Robot Olympiad) team or just try it?

üåç Theme: The Future of Robots
üöÄ Mission: Shape tomorrow with innovative robotic solutions!

Are you ready to tackle real-world problems with cutting-edge robotics?

Design a robot that:

  • Organizes Future Cities: Build robots that improve urban transportation, save resources, and create sustainable environments.
  • Supports Life in Space: Develop robots to build habitats, find resources, or assist with interstellar travel.
  • Improves Daily Life with AI: Combine AI and robotics to enhance manufacturing, assist workers, or personalize everyday experiences.

Bring a friend or two, and we‚Äôll provide everything you need‚Äîmaterials to build your robot, expert coaching, and a dedicated space to practice. Don‚Äôt miss this exciting opportunity to learn, create, and compete! üöÄü§ñ
